name: The Haunted Fair
description:
Going to a fair, winning toys and buying candy sounds fun, right?

But what if I told you the fate of your friends depends on your choices...

Features

Three endings (good, bad and true ending)

5k+ words

15-20 minutes playtime

You can download a game guide below (pdf) if you have trouble reaching any of the endings!

Created by

Maricu Mana @ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Maricu_Mana

Koncookie @ Discord: Koncookie#8721

Content Warning

Contains kidnapping.

Mentions murder and violence.
